meanings.definition: A person who treats diseases and disorders of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The oculists at the clinic helped me with my eye problem.
meanings.sent2: The oculists in the hospital have advanced equipment to diagnose eye conditions.
meanings.sent3: I told a joke to the oculists, and they had a good laugh while examining my eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in treating eye issues made her stand out among other oculists.
meanings.sent5: The oculists' dedication to improving patients' vision is truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: The team of oculists gathered for a conference to discuss new treatments.
meanings.sent2: Many oculists attended the symposium to share their expertise.
meanings.sent3: The oculists' convention turned into a lively event with engaging discussions.
meanings.sent4: In the world of eye care, oculists play a crucial role in preserving vision.
meanings.sent5: The collaboration among oculists led to groundbreaking research in ophthalmology.
